SummaryEnglish: BUDDYBOT tells the story of the friendship between Chloe, an ordinary and stubborn 12-year-old girl, and Buddybot, a little robot from the future! Sent by a mysterious creator, the robot comes from a time when the effects of climate change have drastically taken their toll. Buddybot wants him and Chloe to take action now, in order to instill positive change for the future. In other words: save the world!
